thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com
thread.title: Brian
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Brian

author: Brian
title: Brian
text: CB Radio radio kit was complete and reasonably priced. You could also customize it during the order process according to where on your Jeep and how you wanted the antenna mounted. Arrived quickly, and I got a follow up email to make sure everything was ok. Nice job, Right Channel Radios - not many companies give a crap anymore. Glad you do.
